name: Family Conflict Movies Quiz | Classic Movies | 10 Questions

questions.text: "The Music Box" pits a daughter against her father (who may or may not be a Nazi). What is hidden inside of the music box?
questions.explanation:
Photographs.

	Fine drama, well done. Jessica Lange as the daughter.

questions.text: "Class Action" also involves a conflict between a daughter and her father. Both work in the same field. What do they do?
questions.explanation:
Lawyers.

	Gene Hackman and Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio. Another good movie.

questions.text: "Ordinary People" involves a family in crisis following the death of a son. How did he die?
questions.explanation:
Drowning.

	Powerful movie with Mary Tyler Moore, Donald Sutherland, Judd Hirsch and Timothy Hutton as the surviving son.

questions.text: "I Never Sang For My Father" was a fine drama involving a father-son conflict. Who played the father?
questions.explanation:
Melvyn Douglas.

	Gene Hackman as the son. Quite well done.

questions.text: "Mildred Pierce" was a huge role for Joan Crawford. Mildred worked her way up from rags to riches in order to give the finer things to her daughter. How did she do this?
questions.explanation:
She ran a restaurant.

	Crawford's Oscar.

questions.text: "Dial M For Murder" featured the ultimate conflict between husband and wife: a murder plot. Who did the husband utilize to attempt the crime?
questions.explanation:
An acquaintance from school.

	Hitchcock masterpiece with Ray Milland, Grace Kelly and Robert Cummings.

questions.text: "Sorry, Wrong Number" also involves a murder plot arising from a husband and wife relationship. What is one of the problems that the couple has?
questions.explanation:
She has money; he doesn't.

	He's from the poor side of town; she's the big shot's daughter. Good movie.

questions.text: "Adam's Rib" was one of many collaborations between Spencer Tracy and Katharine Hepburn. Both played lawyers (on opposite sides of the case). Who played the philandering husband?
questions.explanation:
Tom Ewell.

	Ewell is known mostly for "Seven Year Itch" with Marilyn Monroe.

questions.text: "Home From The Hill" featured a man at odds with his sons and with his wife. Who was the star of the movie?
questions.explanation:
Robert Mitchum.

	With George Peppard and George Hamilton. Superior soap.

questions.text: "Mommie Dearest" was the legendary tale of Joan Crawford's problems as a mother. Who was the author?
questions.explanation:
An adopted daughter.

	Christina Crawford was adopted.
